result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ
result.translation: Yeroo isaan kafaran shira sirratti baasan [yaadadhu], si hidhuuf yookiin si ajjeesuf yookiin (biyya irraa) si baasuuf. Isaan shira baasu; Rabbiinis shira baasa (shira isaanii isaan irratti deebisa), Rabbiin irra caalaa warra tooftaa baasuuti.
